Blacknightmare::

"Follow me.." said kindly the femme and openenind the thing tha 
seemed be a cr."here is... ths is a reprogramation chamber, you just 
come in and relax.... One thing," she said "After I end this process, 
you will remember you past, your brothers and you will have your 
charming personality, but your point of view will be a Predacon's 
poin of view; you won't see the things like you see now... If still 
you're decided to reprogramation process, go ahead and come in in the 
chamber..." 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Orchestra::
> 
>       Composer slightly lifts his head and looks at Wheeljack.
> 
>         "Well, I haven't come up with anything much, I'm still 
trying to
> figure something out," He answered Wheeljack.
> 
>          He lowered his head back into the map.
> 
>          "Oh, by the way, how're you doin' over there?" He asked 
kindly,
> while still looking over the map.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>           Orchestra's eyes scoured the lab, then looked anxiously at
> Blacknightmare.
> 
>            "Well, I must say, pretty nice little laboratory," He
> complimented.
> 
>              He then clenched his hands in eager fists.
> 
>              "I'm ready for reprogramming!" He said with an evil 
grin.
